entry.content:
What a busy day!

没有咖啡的日子真的很难熬，咖啡组成的坚实壁垒曾为我挡下了一波又一波的困意——虽然有的时候会backfire到我，让我中午该睡的时候不能得以安详入睡，但是我真的好爱喝咖啡。今天我是匹马单枪迎战_melatonin_的勇士，很显然，我败下阵来了，盯着电脑屏幕，虽然知道有很多事情要做，但是完全提不起任何兴趣来做。就这样在痛苦挣扎中度过上午。

即使是在这样的上午，我发现了一个非常_cool_的网站，不过我想可能是因为我发现它发现的太晚了。它是一个html的模板网站，里面有很多现成的HTML模板，说来也奇怪，最近养成了一种好习惯，那就是遇到什么需求都会去问GPT：给我分享几个免费在线计算资源的网站吧，给我分享几个神经网络的绘图网站吧…很显然，GPT会以直接到有些生硬的方式去真诚地为你提供这些网站，它们中的每一个都有一种让我相见恨晚的感觉。

本来打算研究一下html的样式，想着是否自己能够实现一下这炫酷的样式，但是4000行的css样式表属实将人劝退，只得作罢。

下午重新回顾了一下自然语言处理的课程设计任务一:基于方面的情感分析任务，之前由于恐惧自己不能够完成任务，于是直接选择上Github上搬运其他人的代码，结果其他人的代码看着真的很劝退，在一个完全BlackBox的情况下，运行他人的成果。现在没有了紧迫的Deadline，终于有机会能够静下心来研究一下其内里了。

仔细拆解来看，其实并不难。无非就分为数据预处理、向量化(采用GloVe以及BERT)、神经网络训练这三步。

TO BE CONTINUED…

entry.title: My New Post
entry.content:
To say something

Err well… Since I’ve not been using markdown to mark down something for a while, I thought it’s gonna be the very time for me to really delve them out again from the long dust-covered corner within my memories…

How should I do that? Well, I reckon that recollection of markdown GRAMMAR is gonna be great(Ha, you’ve got me, I did have my first try there for a gramma, But there would be more below).So, as all of you guys can see, my first, or I should say second-first post more properly here on Hexo, would be all in that format. I would make sure to use Grammar stuff naturally, since self-conscious using is always inferior to that when really needed!

Secondary Title

Nothing much to say about this secondary title as well, but I would like to share some reason for why I’d like to pick up markdown somehow:

  • I wanna recollect things that I learned.
  • I noticed that my fellow students were doing this cool Hexo bloc.
  • PS: The second* was actually the first-of-all reason.

See? I’ve just learned to use unordered list, quite funny isn’t it?
Woah, I admit I deflected out there. To really indicate the importance of aforementioned reasons, I would organize my words again:

  1. I noticed that my fellow students were doing this cool Hexo bloc.
  2. (And I realized that) I wanna recollect things that I learned.
  3. (which drived me to think that) I am a jerk in my field.
    • (And I realized that) I need to move up.
    • (And now as you can see) I did do something right now.

That was a combo of ordered and unordered list. Say you didn’t notice that without my reminder.

My new pet friend: Marmot


I don’t know how, I just feel like marmots are really cute.

Quotes Section

I like marmots, and I cannot afford to lose marmot, just like China cannot live without Shandong, much like the Occidental cannot lose Jarusalem.

Yep, finished.
